content.question: Babbage’s description of Great Britain’s “tools and machines” best illustrates which of the following developments of the nineteenth century?

choices.label: The abundance of raw materials for manufactured products in Great Britain
Britain’s leadership in the process of industrialization
The development and increasing influence of Marxist thought
The continued influence of the Enlightenment’s mechanistic view of the world on nineteenth-century writers

content.answer: Britain’s leadership in the process of industrialization

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
